item.title: Oven baked chicken casserole
item.description: Ingredients 1 chicken fillet One small onion, chopped Three garlic cloves One carrot, chopped 5 ish medium mushrooms, sliced Half bell pepper, chopped 1 tbs butter 1 big tbs flour A dash Milk 1dl Cream Salt Pepper Mixed herbs Chilli flakes Chilli powder Paprika powder 1 tbs Tomato pur√©e Cheese Directions Cut the chicken into small bite sized pieces and fry in a pan with salt , chilli powder and paprika powder, then remove from pan.
